resources.string:
version: 1.11
 versioncode: 16
 date: 2019-06-28
 message:
 * Pinch to zoom on weight vizualizations
 * Added CIFAR 10 (plane, cat, car?) template and data
 * Dialogs can be minimized to tray
 * Made neural network code open source at [https://github.com/viveret/kt-nn](https://github.com/viveret/kt-nn)
 * Have ideas? Send me a message! My e-mail is [viveret.amant.official@gmail.com](mailto:viveret.amant.official@gmail.com)

version: 1.10a
 versioncode: 15
 date: 2019-05-14
 message:
 * Fixed some bugs when downloading training data

version: 1.10
 versioncode: 14
 date: 2019-05-03
 message:
 * Updated add layer view
 * Added challenge mode
 * Added MNIST RNN 2 (better accuracy)

version: 1.9
 versioncode: 13
 date: 2019-04-20
 message:
 * Load networkModelWithWeights and saved weights from a file
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.8
 versioncode: 12
 date: 2019-04-14
 message:
 * Updated icons
 * Can browse cached data suites and values
 * Can save networkModelWithWeights or weights to a file

version: 1.7
 versioncode: 11
 date: 2019-04-09
 message:
 * Added ability to stop training
 * Bug fixes with layer visualization

version: 1.6
 versioncode: 10
 date: 2019-04-08
 message:
 * Smart filtering of scenarios and data methods based on current project
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.5
 versioncode: 9
 date: 2019-04-06
 message:
 * Updated color scheme and graphics
 * Added ability to visualize layer outputs and weights
 * Some bug fixes and other tweaks

version: 1.4b
 versioncode: 8
 date: 2019-03-21
 message:
 * Added changelog dialog on start

version: 1.4a
 versioncode: 7
 date: 2019-03-20
 message:
 * Added camera and canvas input
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.4
 versioncode: 6
 date: 2019-03-16
 message:
 * Added MNIST data set
 * Added data browsing
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.3a
 versioncode: 5
 date: 2019-02-03
 message:
 * Fixed bug when entering sandbox

version: 1.3
 versioncode: 4
 date: 2019-01-26
 message:
 * Added better error messages
 * Ability to save and view training and prediction results
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.2
 versioncode: 3
 date: 2018-10-12
 message:
 * Training shows progress
 * Added default inputs and outputs for training binary gate AI
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.1
 versioncode: 2
 date: 2018-10-04
 message:
 * Ability to add layers
 * More training optimization options
 * Bug fixes

version: 1.0
 versioncode: 1
 date: 2018-06-12
 message:
 * First release
